pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, October 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages Mélanie Joly will participate in a virtual discussion on business in Quebec, hosted by Manufacturiers et Exportateurs du Québec

The event will be livestreamed via the Canadian Manufacturers and Exporters Facebook page, at: https://www.facebook.com/Canadian-Manufacturers-Exporters-443329612774644

Media Appearances

8:15 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Y a pas deux matins pareils on ICI Radio Canada Première.

8:37 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on 680 CJOB.
